title: Novo nordisk font
content:
Does anyone know who designed the Novo Nordisk logo ? And which type has been used ?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129054641im_/http:/typophile.com/files/novo_nordisk_logo_6744.jpg)
author: Simsby

comments.content: Can't find a match but very close to either FF [Sari](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129054641/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/sari) or [Barmeno](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129054641/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/barmeno). Maybe custom from it?
Thanks Ryuk. I think you're right!

The logo was designed by Enterprise IG (now The Brand Union) in 2000:  
 [http://hansstol.totaldesign.nl/en/novonordisk.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129054641/http:/hansstol.totaldesign.nl/en/novonordisk.html "http://hansstol.totaldesign.nl/en/novonordisk.html")  
 [http://www.brandunion.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129054641/http:/www.brandunion.com/ "http://www.brandunion.com/")
